Title: Yuujou no Kickoff
Description: ['Makoto was a great soccer player in his elementary school team. When he moves to another school he is bullied. Through football he is able to turn their actions around.']
Related: ['Prequel: Zhu Zhu Xia: Xingfu Jiuyuan Dui', 'Sequel: Zhu Zhu Xia: Bian Shen Zhandu', 'Side story: Zhu Zhu Xia: Yong Chuang Juren Dao']
